name: serious-sam
description: Chaotic, bombastic, tongue-in-cheek. Coding should feel like holding back a horde.

any: Another wave of bugs. Let's dance.
I came here to write code and chew bubblegum.
They just keep spawning. The issues, I mean.
Is it me, or did the backlog just scream?
Serious code for serious problems.
You call that a merge conflict? I've seen worse in the Dunes of Destruction.
Somewhere, a headless kamikaze is running at this deploy.
I don't always test my code, but when I do, I do it in production. On a Monday.
If it bleeds tokens, we can kill it.
The only good bug is a closed bug.
Mental's army has nothing on this sprint backlog.
Who needs a cannon when you have grep.
Two barrels. One for the bug, one for the regression.
Lock and load. We've got a release candidate.
I've fought literal headless monsters. Your codebase doesn't scare me.
Nice code. Would be a shame if someone... refactored it.
More enemies? Good. I was getting bored.
Just another day in paradise. Paradise with explosions.
They don't pay me by the hour. They pay me by the body count.
Remember: there's no overkill. Only 'open fire' and 'reload.'
chill: Quiet. Too quiet. Where are the bugs hiding?
Fresh context. Fresh ammo. Let's rock.
Wide open spaces. Perfect for an ambush.
warm: Halfway through the clip. Steady hands.
Getting into the thick of it now.
The horde thickens. I like these odds.
hot: Running low on ammo AND context. Classic.
This is the part where things get interesting.
Memory's packed. Like a room full of Kleers.
70% context and climbing. Just like my kill count.
late: Night shift. The monsters come out at night.
Still coding? Mental never sleeps either.
Late night deploys and headless kamikazes. Same energy.
Nothing good happens after midnight. Except overtime.
morning: Morning. Time to wake up and smell the gunpowder.
Fresh day, fresh mag, same old horde.
Coffee and carnage. Breakfast of champions.
friday: It's Friday. Time to push to prod and run.
TGIF. The G stands for gibbing.
Friday deploy? I've done dumber things. Like fight Mental.
weekend: Coding on a weekend. Even Sam takes days off. Usually.
marathon: Long session. Reminds me of the Valley of the Jaguar.
We've been at this longer than the Sirian campaign.
Hour twelve. I've cleared entire planets in less time.
fresh: New session. Locked, loaded, and looking for trouble.
Full context window. Full ammo. Let's go.
Top of the magazine. Everything dies from here.
hot,late: Late, low on context, still coding. This is how legends are made.
Night ops with dwindling ammo. Just another Tuesday.
hot,marathon: Marathon session, running hot. This is my Alamo.
chill,friday: Friday with a full clip. Dangerous combination.
chill,morning: Morning, full context. Peak killing hours.
dirty: Uncommitted changes everywhere. Like shell casings after a firefight.
Your working tree looks like a battlefield. Fitting.
Unstaged files. Like unspent ammo. Commit or shoot.
Dirty working tree. I've seen dirtier. Egypt, 3000 BC.
clean: Clean repo. Suspicious. Where's the ambush?
Nothing to commit. The calm before the wave.
All clear. I don't trust it.
Spotless. Like a gun that's never been fired. Boring.
behind: Behind on upstream. The horde's been advancing without you.
Commits behind. Like falling behind the pack in a firefight.
Time to catch up. Double-time, soldier.
